resources.string: The pressure inside of a Champagne bottle is greater than the pressure inside of an automobile tire.
The continent of Africa is so large that it is capable of holding Europe, The US, India, and China within it.
The Nazi party created the Swastika.
There are only three countries in the world which are completely surrounded by another country.
Typing the word "Typewriter" on a keyboard uses only the top row of keys.
